entities.name: hermy
entities.description: Hermy is introduced as a difficult name for Grawp to remember. It is mentioned that Hermy is going to come and meet Grawp.

entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is introduced as someone who has difficulty remembering names, specifically 'Hermy'. He is also shown to have aggressive behavior towards Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who will be coming to meet Grawp. She is shaken and whimpering after Grawp's aggressive behavior.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as someone who scolds Grawp for his bad behavior. He gets hurt in the process.

relationships.description: Grawp's hand shot out towards Hermione, showing aggressive behavior.
Hagrid scolds Grawp for his bad behavior.
